page.title: 02EVENTS
page.content: 1.{May Day Carnival}A parade of decorated floats entered by local organisations with shields awarded to adult and junior section section winners.Stalls and sideshows take place on the village green. 2.{British Legion}Sports Day for children held on village green. 3.{British Legion}Flower and Produce Show with children's art competetion. 4.{St.Mary's Church}Garden Party held in vicarage garden. 5.{Primary School}Michaelmas Fayre. 6.{Baptist Church}Annual Sale of Work. 7.{St.Mary's Church}Christmas Fair. 8.{Travelling Fair}visits green every autumn. 9.{Baptists}monthly waste paper collection.Profits to village groups. 10.{W.I.}Carol Singing and Pancake Day.
